content.text:
# Comparison of webcam software

Webcam software allows users to take pictures and video and save them to their computer.
{| class="wikitable sortable" style="font-size: 85%; text-align: center; width: auto"
|-
! style="width:12em" |
!URL
! Operating system
! License
